alert.note: Alert for Northern Big Horn; Southern Big Horn; Southern Rosebud (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 6:22PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EAST CENTRAL BIG HORN AND SOUTHERN ROSEBUD COUNTIES THROUGH 700 PM MDT... At 621 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Busby, or 31 miles southeast of Hardin, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Busby, Birney Village, and Northern Cheyenne Indian Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Big Horn; Southern Big Horn; Southern Rosebud
